Questions.Question: What is the most popular video game of all time?
Questions.Explanation: Minecraft is the best-selling video game of all time, with over 200 million copies sold.

Questions.Question: Which game is known for its battle royale mode?
Questions.Explanation: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds popularized the battle royale genre, where players fight to be the last one standing.

Questions.Question: What is the main character's name in 'The Witcher' series?
Questions.Explanation: Geralt of Rivia is the protagonist in 'The Witcher' series, a monster hunter with supernatural abilities.

Questions.Question: Which game features a plumber named Mario?
Questions.Explanation: Super Mario Bros. is a classic platforming game where players control Mario to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser.

Questions.Question: What is the best-selling gaming console of all time?
Questions.Explanation: The PlayStation 2 holds the record for the best-selling gaming console, with over 155 million units sold worldwide.

Questions.Question: Which game is set in a post-apocalyptic wasteland?
Questions.Explanation: Fallout is a series of role-playing games set in a world devastated by nuclear war, with players navigating the wasteland.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the protagonist in 'The Legend of Zelda' series?
Questions.Explanation: Link is the hero in 'The Legend of Zelda' series, tasked with rescuing Princess Zelda and defeating Ganon.

Questions.Question: Which game features a group of four turtles named after famous artists?
Questions.Explanation: The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles game follows the adventures of Leonardo, Donatello, Michelangelo, and Raphael.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the main character in 'Assassin's Creed'?
Questions.Explanation: Ezio Auditore da Firenze is the main character in several 'Assassin's Creed' games, known for his stealth and parkour skills.

Questions.Question: Which game features a character named Master Chief?
Questions.Explanation: Master Chief is the protagonist in the 'Halo' series, a super-soldier fighting against alien forces.

Questions.Question: What is the best-selling video game franchise of all time?
Questions.Explanation: The 'Mario' franchise, featuring games like Super Mario Bros. and Mario Kart, is the best-selling video game franchise.

Questions.Question: Which game is known for its block-building and creative gameplay?
Questions.Explanation: Minecraft allows players to build and explore virtual worlds made up of blocks, fostering creativity and imagination.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the main character in 'God of War'?
Questions.Explanation: Kratos is the Spartan warrior seeking revenge against the gods in the 'God of War' series.

Questions.Question: Which game is known for its addictive puzzle gameplay?
Questions.Explanation: Tetris is a classic puzzle game where players arrange falling blocks to create complete lines and score points.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the main character in 'Metal Gear Solid'?
Questions.Explanation: Solid Snake is the main protagonist in the 'Metal Gear Solid' series, a stealth operative fighting against terrorists.

Questions.Question: Which game is known for its competitive multiplayer mode?
Questions.Explanation: Call of Duty is a popular first-person shooter game with intense multiplayer battles against other players.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the main character in 'Uncharted'?
Questions.Explanation: Nathan Drake is the treasure-hunting adventurer in the 'Uncharted' series, known for his wit and resourcefulness.

Questions.Question: Which game is known for its massive multiplayer online role-playing experience?
Questions.Explanation: World of Warcraft is a popular MMORPG where players can explore a vast fantasy world and complete quests with others.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the main character in 'Final Fantasy VII'?
Questions.Explanation: Cloud Strife is the main protagonist in 'Final Fantasy VII', a mercenary caught up in a battle against an evil corporation.

Questions.Question: Which game is known for its tactical team-based gameplay?
Questions.Explanation: Rainbow Six Siege is a tactical first-person shooter where players work together in teams to complete objectives.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the main character in 'The Last of Us'?
Questions.Explanation: Joel is one of the main protagonists in 'The Last of Us', a post-apocalyptic game focused on survival and human relationships.
